row.entry: Status icon for hosts is the same whether offline or unauthorized.
RabbitMQ admin web interface links are broken for the /zenoss exchanges/queues.

When generates the logstash.conf file used by the Docker container serviced-isvcs_logstash, it might generate duplicate entries for some of the service-specific filters. When that happens, Logstash might not properly forward data to Elasticsearch.
When upgrading to 1.3.2, the check for serviced thinpool reports errors on delegates as if they do not have any thinpools.
Display version information after upgrade or new installation of .
Allow configurable logging of Logrus messages in serviced-controller.
When connections fail, ZooKeeper aggressively attempts to re-establish network connections, which can lead to a flood of SYN packets from remote delegates to their VPN server.
Improved log content and easier control of per-package log levels.
When a delegate is disconnected from the master, glog attempts to reconnect very aggressively in an attempt to find Logstash. This behavior can lead to a flood of unneeded network requests.
Docker has been upgraded to 17.03.1 to address a variety of potential issues.
serviced base device potentially can grow after restart.
